lead_paragraph: The employees, both Pakistanis, were in a convoy in the Mohmand tribal region as part of an anti-narcotics team reviewing poppy eradication efforts.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Pakistan: Bomb Kills 2 Employees of American Consulate in Peshawar
headline.main: Roadside Bomb in Pakistan Kills 2 Employees of U.S. Consulate

snippet: The employees, both Pakistanis, were in a convoy in the Mohmand tribal region as part of an anti-narcotics team reviewing poppy eradication efforts.
abstract: Pakistani Taliban faction Jamaat-e-Ahrar claims responsibility for roadside bomb that killed two Pakistani employees of United States Consulate in Peshawar, Pakistan.
